input.sentences: my wife was dressed in a very lovely white dress .
we all gathered together for that occasion .
i had a lot of family members who showed me support .
my mom and dad were together as well .
the bride and the uncle were taking pictures beforehand .
output.sentences: My friend got married last week, and she looked lovely in her white dress.
You could tell that her father was excited for the event.
Lots of friends and family were gathered to share their support.
My friends family paid lots of attention to her during the day.
She had the largest smile on her face while her dad was walking her down the aisle.
